paper_title: Light quark and antiquark constraints from new electroweak data
abstract: We present a new parton distribution function analysis which includes new data for W boson production in proton-proton collisions and lepton pair production in proton-proton and proton-deuteron collisions. The new data provide strong constraints on the light antiquark parton distribution functions in the proton. We identify an interesting correlation between the $d/u$ ratio and the $\bar{d}/\bar{u}$ ratio which leads to a modification of our previous results for the $d/u$ ratio as the parton momentum fraction $x \rightarrow 1.$
